slide.title: Creating a Presentation
slide.blurb: Create a new file in the %presentations/% directory. %foo.xml%, for example. A small sample %presentations/foo.xml% file is included below.
slide.example:
<presentation> <topic>PHP</topic> <title>Introduction to PHP</title> <event>Conference for SuperCool Presentations</event> <location>Copenhagen</location> <date>November 22, 2002</date> <speaker>Joe Speaker</speaker> <email>joe@example.com</email> <url>http://www.example.com/show.php/foo</url>
<slide>slides/foo/titlepage.xml</slide> <slide>slides/foo/intro.xml</slide> <slide>slides/foo/demo.xml</slide> </presentation>
